channel.title: Comments on: Ideas That Made Money Although They Shouldn’t Have
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I didn't notice that, because eventually these are ads and why should I click ads? The idea was great at the time, and many tried to mimic this guy's success (even an Israeli site was established), but I don't think anyone made that much money.
item.content:encoded:
I didn’t notice that, because eventually these are ads and why should I click ads?
The idea was great at the time, and many tried to mimic this guy’s success (even an Israeli site was established), but I don’t think anyone made that much money.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: The first one is great! Did you notice that some who bought space doing the same thing, so it's like a piramide.
item.content:encoded: The first one is great! Did you notice that some who bought space doing the same thing, so it’s like a piramide.
